DOC.brief_summary: This is an antibiotic intervention study to determine the value of using piperacillin/tazobactam in reducing the cases of ESBL producing E. coli or K. pneumoniae colonization and infection.
DOC.criteria: All patients admitted or transferred to ICU/Pulmonary units Patients of either sex, 18 years of age or older Patients who stay in units less than 48 hours will not be enrolled.
